ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] Just got an idea that might solve the only instance where cookies are useful
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Agreed, but I don t think cookies are the problem in that case: one could do the same damage with, say, Apache Basic Auth.

On 11/24/07, Elliotte Harold <elharo@...> wrote:
> If resources such as a user's shopping cart or a particular user's
> preferences are generated dynamically, then URLs pointing to these
> resources shoudl also be generated dynamically and the user should be
> redirected to those resources.

Agreed, but I don't think cookies are the problem in that case: one
could do the same damage with, say, Apache Basic Auth.
